Name: Pale Cachexia
About the game: In this Gothic story of deep bonds and chilling mystery, a young girl named Esther ventures deep within a forgotten forest. There, she seeks out a potential cure for her mysterious illness: a life-leeching plague known as the Pale Cachexia. But when Esther meets Seina, who lives all alone in a towering manor, the two girls are drawn to each other in a tale of friendship, sorrow, and bitter loneliness. Their story is shadowed by the dark secrets of the manor and its graveyard, which haunts Esther even in her deepest dreams. Genres: Kinetic novel, Gothic fantasy, drama, horror Rating: PG-13 (language/mild horror) Story Type: Linear/kinetic Length: 48,000 words (4-5 hours playtime) Accessibility Features: Sound/Music closed captions, OpenDyslexic font option, disable bright flashes option Writing/Design/Programming: Dovah Management/Programming: Gamma Sprite Art: NicCo CG Art/Key Visual: NumiRen Background Art: Malthus Wolf Music: Ray Kim, Murcielo, scarless arms
